tasks.task: Understand and implement regenerative agricultural practices.
subtasks: Study the impact of current agricultural practices on biodiversity.
Learn about the benefits of regenerative agriculture in soil health and carbon sequestration.
Implement no-till farming by maintaining soil cover and utilizing cover crops.
Adjust cattle grazing methods to encourage optimal grass growth and topsoil development.
Design a food forest with multiple layers of vegetation, incorporating native species.

tasks.task: Foster relationship with the land by promoting ecological resilience and biodiversity.
subtasks: Observe local ecosystems to inform agricultural practices.

tasks.task: Understand and implement regenerative agricultural practices.
